banner.title: Test assignment for Frontend Developer position
content: We kindly remind you that your test assignment should be submitted as a link to github/bitbucket repository.
Please be patient, we consider and respond to every application that meets minimum requirements. We look forward to your submission. Good luck!

about.title: Let's get ac quainted
content: When real users have a slow experience on mobile, they're much less likely to find what they are looking for or purchase from you in the future. For many sites this equates to a huge missed opportunity, especially when more than half of visits are abandoned if a mobile page takes over 3 seconds to load.
Last week, Google Search and Ads teams announced two new speed initiatives to help improve user-experience on the web.
